Class NuclearPhysics

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.quantum.NuclearPhysics
public class NuclearPhysics extends Object
Nuclear physics - decay, fission, fusion, binding energy.

Based on latest nuclear data and modern computational methods.

* @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Real
    activity(Real decayConstant, Real numAtoms)
    Activity: A = λN = (ln(2)/t₁/₂)N Returns decay rate (Becquerels)
    static Real
    bindingEnergyPerNucleon(int A, int Z)
    Binding energy per nucleon (semi-empirical mass formula - SEMF): BE/A ≈ aᵥ - aₛA^(-1/3) - aₒZ(Z-1)/A^(4/3) - aₐ(A-2Z)²/A² ± δ/A^(1/2) Simplified version using Weizsäcker formula constants
    static Real
    criticalMassFactor(Real density, Real crossSection)
    Critical mass (simplified sphere): M_crit ∝ 1/(ρσ) Rough estimate for bare sphere
    static Real
    exactCriticalMass(Real density, Real nu, Real sigmaF, Real sigmaA, Real diffusionCoeff)
    Exact Critical Mass (Diffusion Approximation for Bare Sphere).
    static Real
    fissionEnergy(Real numFissions)
    Fission energy release (U-235): ~200 MeV per fission Returns energy from N fissions
    static Real
    fusionReactionRate(Real density1, Real density2, Real temperature)
    Deuterium-Tritium fusion cross-section peak at ~100 keV Returns approximate reaction rate (simplified)
    static Real
    halfLife(Real decayConstant)
    Half-life from decay constant: t₁/₂ = ln(2)/λ
    static Real
    lawsonTripleProduct(Real density, Real confinementTime, Real temperature)
    Fusion power (Lawson criterion): nτT > critical value Returns triple product for fusion ignition assessment
    static Real
    massEnergy(Real mass)
    Mass-energy equivalence: E = mc²
    static Real
    multiplicationFactor(Real produced, Real absorbed)
    Neutron multiplication factor: k = (neutrons produced)/(neutrons absorbed) k > 1: supercritical, k = 1: critical, k invalid input: '<' 1: subcritical
    static Real
    qValue(Real reactantMass, Real productMass)
    Q-value for nuclear reaction: Q = (Σm_reactants - Σm_products)c²
    static Real
    radioactiveDecay(Real initialAmount, Real decayConstant, Real time)
    Radioactive decay: N(t) = N₀e^(-λt) Returns remaining atoms at time t

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public static Real bindingEnergyPerNucleon(int A, int Z)
      Binding energy per nucleon (semi-empirical mass formula - SEMF): BE/A ≈ aᵥ - aₛA^(-1/3) - aₒZ(Z-1)/A^(4/3) - aₐ(A-2Z)²/A² ± δ/A^(1/2) Simplified version using Weizsäcker formula constants

    • criticalMassFactor

      public static Real criticalMassFactor(Real density, Real crossSection)

    • exactCriticalMass

      public static Real exactCriticalMass(Real density, Real nu, Real sigmaF, Real sigmaA, Real diffusionCoeff)
      Exact Critical Mass (Diffusion Approximation for Bare Sphere).

      M_c = (4/3) * pi * R_c^3 * rho R_c = pi / B_g B_g = sqrt((nu * Sigma_f - Sigma_a) / D)

      Parameters:
      density - density (rho)
      nu - average neutrons per fission
      sigmaF - macroscopic fission cross-section
      sigmaA - macroscopic absorption cross-section
      diffusionCoeff - diffusion coefficient (D)
      Returns:
      critical mass

    • multiplicationFactor

      public static Real multiplicationFactor(Real produced, Real absorbed)
      Neutron multiplication factor: k = (neutrons produced)/(neutrons absorbed) k > 1: supercritical, k = 1: critical, k invalid input: '<' 1: subcritical

    • fusionReactionRate

      public static Real fusionReactionRate(Real density1, Real density2, Real temperature)
      Deuterium-Tritium fusion cross-section peak at ~100 keV Returns approximate reaction rate (simplified)
